name: MeasureCICD
description: Task for running J3WT Measure as part of the CI/CD pipeline.
author: J3WT Corp

inputs.name: measureUrl
inputs.label: Measure Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL for Measure.  Change this value if running locally.

inputs.name: measureProjectApi
inputs.label: Measure Project API
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Measure Project API.  Go to the project settings in Measure to obtain this value.

inputs.name: measureFailOnOverride
inputs.label: Fail on Run History Override
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines if overriding run history in Measure is a failure or not.  If set to false, run history can potentially be deleted.

inputs.name: measureRepoUserName
inputs.label: The username for the source control repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uses the username to authenticate to source control.  If SSH is used, this can be ignored.

inputs.name: measureRepoPassword
inputs.label: The password for the source control repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uses the password to authenticate to source control.  If SSH is used, this can be ignored.
